item.title: Repository Pattern
item.description: Repository Pattern The repository pattern decouples your data store from your implementation. This solves a big problem in unit testing and development, which is: “Do I have to interact with a real database in my unit tests?” With the repository pattern, the answer is no. … insert example that compiles Test-Driven Development “Remember, we’re not going to code anything that doesn’t convert failing test into a passing one.” 1
